scripts.pack: rm -rf web/dist && cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack --config webpack.config.babel.js
scripts.dev: rm -rf web/dist && cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack --config webpack.config.babel.js --watch
scripts.build: rm -rf web/dist && cross-env NODE_ENV=production  webpack --config webpack.config.babel.js --progress --hide-modules
